name: Badge
description: Badge generates a small badge to the corner of its child(ren).

properties.name: badgeLabel
properties.label: Badge Label
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the label of the Badge. Value returned by the handler will be used as the label of the Badge.
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the label of the badge.

properties.name: badgeLabelColor
properties.label: Badge Label Color
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the color of the badge label.

properties.name: badgeBackgroundColor
properties.label: Badge Background Color
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the background color of the badge.

properties.name: badgeFontSize
properties.label: Badge Font Size
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the font size of the badge label.

properties.name: badgeAlignment
properties.label: Badge Alignment
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the position of the badge.

properties.name: badgeVisibility
properties.label: Badge Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if Badge should be visible. If the handler returns 'true' Budge will be displayed.
properties.settingTooltip: Enables the visibility of the badge.

properties.name: badgeWidth
properties.label: Badge Width
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the width of the badge.

properties.name: badgeHeight
properties.label: Badge Height
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the height of the badge.

properties.name: badgeForm
properties.label: Badge Form
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the form of the badge.

properties.name: icon
properties.label: Icon
properties.settingTooltip: Specifies the icon content of the component.

properties.name: textContent
properties.label: Text Content
properties.settingTooltip: Specifies the text content of the component.

properties.name: contentFontSize
properties.label: Content Font Size
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the font size of the content.

properties.name: imageUrl
properties.label: Image Url
properties.settingTooltip: Specifies the image content of the component.

properties.name: imageWidth
properties.label: Image Width
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the width of the image content.

properties.name: padding
properties.label: Padding
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the distance from the badge to the component content.

eventHandlers.name: onBadgeClick
eventHandlers.label: On Badge Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the badge.

eventHandlers.name: onBadgeMouseOver
eventHandlers.label: On Badge Mouse Over Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the mouse pointer hovers over the badge.

eventHandlers.name: onBadgeMouseOut
eventHandlers.label: On Badge Mouse Out Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the mouse pointer leaves the badge boundaries.

eventHandlers.name: onContentClick
eventHandlers.label: On Content Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the component content.

eventHandlers.name: onContentMouseOver
eventHandlers.label: On Content Mouse Over Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the mouse pointer hovers over the component content.

eventHandlers.name: onContentMouseOut
eventHandlers.label: On Content Mouse Out Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the mouse pointer leaves the component content boundaries.
